member.name: P:Scripting_Machine.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Scripting_Machine.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Scripting_Machine.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

members.member:
Changelog
Changelog: Added CMYK and HSL color support Added multiple area selection with exporting format Added color selecting for areas Added 0.3d RC 4-2 MoveObject support Added 0.3d RC 5 Skins Added a cmd proccessor selection for Gates Added Deutsch support Added 0.3d RC 5-3 Sprites Improved usage of memory Fixed dialog preview color bug Added zoom to map Added a color picker for the dialog Added Load Objects from file Fixed a color bug with the dialogs previewer Fixed some script bugs Added zoom feature to areas selecting Added 0.3d RC 7 IsObjectMoving support Added SetPlayerWorldBounds support Added Find Next function to Find 'Button' Improved the time-load of the software
